meanings.definition: Capable of being expanded or stretched.
meanings.sent1: The rubber band was very expansible, able to stretch far without breaking.
meanings.sent2: The balloon was quite expansible, growing larger as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent3: The yoga instructor joked that her students were as expansible as rubber bands after a good stretch.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an expansible universe, constantly growing and exploring new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The fabric was so expansible that it could fit people of various sizes comfortably.

meanings.definition: Able to be enlarged or increased in size.
meanings.sent1: The cake was made with an expansible recipe, allowing for extra layers to be added.
meanings.sent2: The backpack had an expansible compartment, perfect for storing extra items.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome seemed to have an expansible hat, as it mysteriously grew bigger overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt as though it was an expansible balloon, growing with each moment spent with her loved ones.
meanings.sent5: The company offered an expansible storage option, allowing customers to increase their space as needed.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to be extended or stretched out.
meanings.sent1: The telescope had an expansible lens, allowing for clear views of distant stars.
meanings.sent2: The slinky toy was fun to play with due to its expansible nature, stretching and bouncing with ease.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail appeared to be expansible, as it puffed up when startled.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like an expansible rubber band, able to withstand many challenges before snapping.
meanings.sent5: The accordion was an expansible musical instrument, capable of producing a wide range of sounds.
